src.sql:
declare @json nvarchar(max) = (
Select Cast((100*Amount/(Amount+(0.05*Amount/12*Length))) as decimal(10,2)) as Principal,Cast((100*(0.05*Amount/12*Length)/(Amount+(0.05*Amount/12*Length))) as decimal(10,2)) as Interest from app.Application
where id = '[TknParams:id]'
for json path
)
select @json as json
